mapper.insert: INSERT INTO moment(unique_id, content, user_id, like_num, dislike_num, comment_num, view_num, is_private, is_share, deleted, create_time) VALUES (#{uniqueId}, #{content}, #{userId}, #{likeNum}, #{dislikeNum}, #{commentNum}, #{viewNum}, #{isPrivate}, #{isShare}, #{deleted}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM moment WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted = FALSE
SELECT * FROM moment WHERE unique_id = #{unqueId} AND deleted = FALSE
SELECT * FROM moment where user_id = ${userId} AND deleted = FALSE
